questions.questionTitle: What is the main purpose of the discussion?
What does the woman plan to do on Tuesday?
When will the woman see the doctor?

script:
� Yes, is this Phyllis Wheatley? This is Simon from Dr. Morgan's office. I'm calling to remind you that you have an appointment for a physical exam on Tuesday at 10 a.m.
� Oh, thank you for calling. I completely forgot, and now I can't make it. Sorry. Can I reschedule?
� Sure. We have openings at 8 Wednesday morning or 4 Wednesday afternoon, then on Thursday at 11 a.m., and Friday in the afternoon: either 1 or 3.
� Let's see. I'll be out of town Tuesday and Wednesday, then I have meetings all day Thursday. OK, so put me down for Friday at 3. I promise I won't forget. Sorry again.
